column4: hello, anyone here never has a dell d820 laptop with nvidia geforce 7400? i've a big problems in settings up
my video card is so slow...i've 512mb video ram
in which case u think your video card is slow?
i see black box when i open a window before it appear. when i move an abject in inkscape it takes time to move and it moves realyl slow
i dunno what to check and how to set up my videocard
i guess there is smt wrong somewhere but i dunno where :)
but i to think if your 2d-desktop not renders proper then you couldn't blame your video-card
or applications try to run special features like overlays
if overlay (video, tv, ...) not displayed proper you could blame your video-card :)
maybe you could join #quiteplacetotalk and paste it there
